original_text: He won over the hearts of the men of Judah so that they were all of one mind. They sent word to the king, “Return, you and all your men.”
korean_text: 모든 유다 사람들의 마음을 하나 같이 기울게 하매 그들이 왕께 전갈을 보내어 이르되 당신께서는 모든 부하들과 더불어 돌아오소서 한지라

sentences.original_text: He won over the hearts of the men of Judah
so that they were all of one mind
They sent word to the king
Return, you and all your men
